scripts.unit: npm run transpile && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run unit
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && cp test/*.abap downport && cp test/*.xml downport && abaplint --fix abaplint-downport.jsonc
scripts.playwright: npx playwright install chrome && npx playwright test
scripts.start: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run transpile && node test/index.mjs
